<title level="1" right="Rules">[Favored Weapon](/Rules.aspx?ID=3353)</title>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 9

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Each deity has a favored weapon. These weapons are not restricted for use by their clerics and champions alone; lay worshippers often train with and wield them in battle as another way to show their devotion. Each of the favored weapons detailed in this book is available to any character with access to it.

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
